IP_SYN_1_style_1:
Dx: Esophageal stent migration to airway.
Anesthesia: GA.
Procedure:
- Flex bronch: Stent visualized blocking distal trachea/LMS. Pus suctioned.
- Rigid bronch (14mm): Inserted.
- Removal: Migrated esophageal stent and clips removed piecemeal (forceps/scissors).
- Repair: TE fistula id[REDACTED]. 13x10x10 Dynamic Y-stent placed to cover defect.
- Airway secured with ETT.
Complications: TE fistula extension.
